title: Thanks for being here <3  @Riot
body:
I know this might not be your average post, but though the years I've had many issues in the game, many of them with me at fault. But through all this time, Rito support has really helped this whole way. If anybody reads this, know that Riot support is probably one of the best support teams out there. My life has had deathly troubles though paypal, amazon, ebay, dell, apple, blizzard, and many others. But nobody does it quite as good as Rito. All in all, thanks rito for keeping my account safe, helping me with bugs, and stupid frame drops. Looking forward to seeing ya again!!! <3 
Much love,
~Ayumi
